name: Jeopardy
summary: Based on the hit television show, Jeopardy! for Game Boy features over 1,500 questions and support for two players. Before starting, you can enter the number of participants and their names. Gameplay consists of moving a cursor and selecting a category and money value. After the question (or answer) appears, you have ten seconds to buzz in. Answering involves selecting each letter on an alphabet display to spell out one or more words. After the first two rounds, players with positive dollar amounts can play in Final Jeopardy! The player with the most money at the end of this round wins the game. For two-player games, you can either link two systems together or share one Game Boy.
